name: Floor Is Lava (YourVRExperience)
description:
Go far.

Go high.

Don't touch the lava.

And never stop.

Mobile version of the popular kids' game the Floor Is Lava.

Modes:

-Single-Player mode: Beat the highscore

-Multiplayer Versus Mode: Race against your rival

Enjoy it in mobile:

Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.yourvrexperience.floorislava

IOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/jump-to-avoid-lava/id1612799122

Enjoy it in VR:

Oculus Quest: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/5052332704818975/

Music:

-First Day Dark: https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/1102353

-Demeor: https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/1069278

Developed by: 

https://www.yourvrexperience.com
